org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.activity

Class ImporterInterchangeValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.digijava.kernel.ampapi.endpoints.activity.ImporterInterchangeValidator

  • public class ImporterInterchangeValidator
extends java.lang.Object
    Acts as a bridge between importer and interchangeable validation. Note: current implementation ignores completely constraint violations coming from field validators.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

        public ImporterInterchangeValidator(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,ApiErrorMessage> errors,

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> validate(APIField type,
                                                   java.lang.Object root,
                                                   TranslationContext translationContext,
                                                   java.lang.Class<?>... groups)
        Invoke interchangeable validation on the root object. If there are constraint violations generated by constraints defined at class level, those violations will be injected into the json object and added to the errors map. Validation is recursive and will reveal constraint violations for root object and also for objects deep into the object tree.
        Parameters:
        type - type information for the object
        root - internal representation of the object
        translationContext - for accessing translated values
        groups - validation groups
        Returns:
        all found constraint violations

      • validateField

        public java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> validateField(APIField field,
                                                        java.lang.Object value,
                                                        TranslatedValueContext translatedValueContext,
                                                        java.lang.Class<?>... groups)
        Validate only constraints targeting the current field.
        Parameters:
        field - the field to validate
        value - the value of the field
        translatedValueContext - for accessing translated values
        groups - validation groups
        Returns:
        all found constraint violations

      • integrateFieldErrorsIntoResult

        public void integrateFieldErrorsIntoResult(java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> violations,
                                           java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> json,
                                           java.lang.String fieldPath)
        Integrate constraint violation related to a field into the result.
        Parameters:
        violations - violations for the field
        json - json relative to the field (json containing the validated field)
        fieldPath - path of the json

      • integrateTypeErrorsIntoResult

        public void integrateTypeErrorsIntoResult(java.util.Set<ConstraintViolation> violations,
                                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> json)
        Integrate constraint violations related to types into the result.
        Parameters:
        violations - all violations, only violations generated by validators defined at type level are taken in account
        json - json representation of the object (root level)
